name: Imgur Custom Tweaks
description: Changes some basic Imgur styles. Custom background, floating top bar, and a messenger update.
additional_info:
This is just a thing I mess around with when the site updates or I get bored of the look. Maybe one day I'll add the modifiers for customization in there when I get more bored. Maybe. Right now I enjoy the way it looks.

Imgur just had a pretty major update. For the most part, things are untouched. The messenger is no longer in the IM style that I prefer. Since it's an overhaul and I have other more pressing responsibilities, I'll get to it.

If anyone has ideas hit up @MasterPrime on imgur. I'll do what I can. I'm not a CSS master and it's hard to want to spend time doing this when Rocket League exists.
